title: Tournament/TeamWiki archive
data: ==0.14 Crawl Tournament== ===TEAM ROSTER=== Remember to put # TEAMCAPTAIN MoogleDan in your 0.14 .rc file. You can check to see if it is correctly placed by clicking on your .rc file link below. Once correctly inserted, your name will show up on the [http://dobrazupa.org/tournament/0.14/clans/moogledan.html team profile] after a few minutes. {| class="wikitable" border="1" |- |'''Player''' En Fi Gl He FE Su VM '''Gods''': Chei Fedhas Jiyva "No God" Sif TSO Veh Zin | Ash Beogh Ely Lugonu Makhleb Nemelex Oka Trog Kiku Xom Yred ==0.12 Crawl Tournament== The new version of ''Crawl'' is nearly here, and with it comes another ''Crawl'' tournament (May 11-26). Anybody think they might be interested in signing up for the team? We got [http://seleniac.org/crawl/tourney/12b/teams.html 4th place] last year, and I'd love to reach the top 3 this time (unlikely though that may be). Competing basically involves playing the latest version of the game online through any of the primary servers. The majority of the points a team earns are awarded for gathering runes, winning (preferably with combinations that haven't been won yet or multiple times in a row), and killing player ghosts, though you should see the [http://dobrazupa.org/tournament/0.12/ official rules] for the full scoring breakdown. The tournament lasts for just over two weeks, during which time you may attempt as many games as you like. ===[http://dobrazupa.org/tournament/0.12/clans/flun.html Current Team Roster]=== {| class="wikitable" border="1" |- |'''Player''' |'''Profile''' |'''Preferred Server(s)''' |'''0.12 .rc file''' |- |[[User:MoogleDan|MoogleDan]] |[http://crawl.akrasiac.org/scoring/players/moogledan.html MoogleDan] |CSZO Webtiles |[http://dobrazupa.org/rcfiles/crawl-0.12/MoogleDan.rc CSZO] |- |[[User:Flun|Flun]] |[http://crawl.akrasiac.org/scoring/players/flun.html Flun] |CSZO Console |[http://dobrazupa.org/rcfiles/crawl-0.12/Flun.rc CSZO] |- |[[User:CommanderC|CommanderC]] |[http://crawl.akrasiac.org/scoring/players/commanderc.html CommanderC] |CDO Console |[http://crawl.develz.org/configs/0.12/commanderc.rc CDO] |- |[[User:spudwalt|spudwalt]] |[http://crawl.akrasiac.org/scoring/players/spudwalt.html spudwalt] |CAO Webtiles |[http://crawl.akrasiac.org/rcfiles/crawl-0.12/spudwalt.rc CAO] |- |[[User:Lokkij|Lokkij]] |[http://crawl.akrasiac.org/scoring/players/lokkij.html Lokkij] |CDO Console (for now) |[http://crawl.develz.org/configs/0.12/Lokkij.rc CDO] |- |[[User:Bwijn|Bwijn]] |[http://crawl.akrasiac.org/scoring/players/bwijn.html Bwijn] |CAO Webtiles |[http://crawl.akrasiac.org/rcfiles/crawl-0.12/Bwijn.rc CAO] |} ===Proposed Team Names=== With a pretty insurmountable lead, I think it's safe to say that we're going in as '''Ashenzari's Archivists'''. === Combos === Cross out when done '''Races''': Ce DD DE Dg Dr Ds Fe Gh Ha HE HO Hu Ko Mf Mi Mu Na Og Op SE Sp Te Tr Vp '''Classes''': AE AK AM Ar As Be Cj CK DK EE En FE Fi Gl He Hu IE Mo Ne Pr Sk St Su Tm VM Wn Wr Wz '''Gods''': Ash Beogh Chei Ely Fedhas Jiyva Kiku Lugonu Makhleb Nemelex No God Oka Sif Trog TSO Veh Xom Yred Zin '''Ongoing games''': [none] (Flun), DDWz (commanderc), Too Many Deaths, I'm Out >_< (MoogleDan), My last character also died YASD, so I'm out too (Lokkij), ''I'm out, too.'' (spudwalt), KoSu (Bwijn) '''Suggested non-overlapping combos''': MiBe, MfSk, DE[EE/IE], DDNe [http://dobrazupa.org/tournament/0.12/species-classes.html Current high value class/species] ==See Also== [[Tournament/TeamWiki]] [[Category:Tournament]]
